original: intros a b. assert (H: eqA (multA (invA (multA a b)) (multA a b)) A1). - apply invA_plusA with (a := multA a b). - rewrite multA_assoc with (a := invA a) (b := a) (c0 := b) in H. rewrite multA_assoc with (a := invA a) (b := multA a b) (c0 := invA (multA a b)) in H. rewrite <- multA_eqA_comp with (a := multA (invA a) (multA a b))(b := invA (multA a b)) (c0 := multA a (invA a)) (d := invA (multA a b)) in H. ++ apply CoefStructure in cs. destruct cs as [H_invA_plusA H]. apply H_invA_plusA. ++ apply multA_com. ++ apply multA_A1_l.
